message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1800000. It's a valuable piece, and I believe it will be a great asset to your business.  Let me know what you think!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1800000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product.  This is my maximum budget, and I'm confident it's a fair price given the value of the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1500000 is still a bit below what I need to make this deal work.  I'm willing to come down to $1650000. This is a fair compromise, and it allows us both to walk away happy. Let's make this happen!
